dialogue.utterance: Skydiving has to be one of the most exhilarating adventure sports. The adrenaline rush is unmatched when you jump out of the plane.

dialogue.utterance: However, the cost of one jump can be quite expensive, which might deter some adventurers.

dialogue.utterance: And the feeling of achievement once you land is fantastic! There’s nothing like it.

rationale.value: you jump out of the plane

dialogue.utterance: The CoralView underwater camera is incredible, the image sharpness is so clear because it captures every detail.
dialogue.annotation: The <target_01> CoralView underwater camera </target_01> is incredible, the <aspect_01> image sharpness </aspect_01> is <opinion_01> so clear </opinion_01> because <rationale_01> it captures every detail </rationale_01>.

dialogue.utterance: Indeed, but its weight underwater is somewhat noticeable, it feels a bit heavy which can be tiring during long dives.
dialogue.annotation: Indeed, but its <aspect_02> weight </aspect_02> underwater is <opinion_02> somewhat noticeable </opinion_02>, <rationale_02> it feels a bit heavy which can be tiring during long dives </rationale_02>.

dialogue.utterance: Does anyone think the battery life is shorter than expected? I constantly have to recharge it.
dialogue.annotation: Does anyone think the <aspect_03> battery life </aspect_03> is <opinion_03> shorter than expected </opinion_03>? <rationale_03> I constantly have to recharge it </rationale_03>.

dialogue.utterance: I actually appreciate the camera’s durability. It has survived multiple drops and still works perfectly!
dialogue.annotation: I actually appreciate the <aspect_04> camera’s durability </aspect_04>. It has survived <opinion_04> multiple drops </opinion_04> and <rationale_04> still works perfectly </rationale_04>!

modality.caption: CoralView underwater camera on the ocean floor, showcasing its durability.

dialogue.utterance: But the camera’s buttons are great, they're very responsive even under water.
dialogue.annotation: But the <aspect_05> camera’s buttons </aspect_05> are <opinion_05> great </opinion_05>, <rationale_05> they're very responsive even under water </rationale_05>.
